actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt independent producers and royalty owners from the windfall profit tax on the first one thousand barrels of daily production.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt independent producer oil and royalty owner oil from the windfall profit tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt independent producers and royalty owners from the windfall profit tax on the first one thousand barrels of daily production.
